show.title: PineTalk Podcast
show.subtitle: A Community Podcast
show.summary:
We discuss PINE64 hardware, software and open source in general.
Send in your questions!
A community ran podcast for the community.

Contact:
Email: pinetalk@pine64.org
Twitter: @TalkPine

title: 001: Introduction
subtitle: Ezra and Peter introduce themselves.
summary: Ezra and Peter introduce themselves. They discuss their computing experiences and also what PineTalk is going to be about.
